alert.note: Alert for Concho; McCulloch; Menard (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 11 at 7:48AM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern McCulloch, north central Menard and southern Concho Counties through 830 AM CST... At 748 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Live Oak, or 8 miles southwest of Eden, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Eden around 800 AM CST. Melvin and Salt Gap around 820 AM CST. Pear Valley around 830 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Us-83 Near The Menard- Concho County Line, The Intersection Of Us- 87 And Ranch Road 2134 and Live Oak. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
